tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE customer_issues (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    resolution TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerIssues (
    issue_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    issue_status TEXT,
    resolution TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CustomerHistory (
    history_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    resolution TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Issue (
  issue_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT REFERENCES Customer(customer_id),
  issue_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  issue_status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'Open',
  date_reported TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Resolution (
  resolution_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  issue_id INT REFERENCES Issue(issue_id),
  resolution_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  resolved_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  resolution_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL,
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    address VARCHAR(100),
    date_created DATE
);

CREATE TABLE issues (
    issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    issue_description TEXT,
    date_reported DATE,
    resolved BOOLEAN DEFAULT false,
    resolution_description TEXT,
    resolved_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE resolutions (
    resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_id INT,
    resolution_description TEXT,
    resolution_date DATE,
    technician_id INT,
    completed BOOLEAN DEFAULT false
);

CREATE TABLE technicians (
    technician_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    technician_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    expertise_area VARCHAR(50),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    email VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE insights (
    insight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    issue_id INT,
    resolution_id INT,
    metric VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    date_created DATE
);
